author: Warheit, Germanus, pseud.
title: Antidotum melancholiæ vel, Schola curiositatis :bomnibus hypochondriacis & atrabili laborantibus, sive fratribus spleneticis & melancholicis, vulgo denen Miltzbrüdern, aperta / a praenobili & expertissimo domino, Dn. Gaudioso von Fürvvitzhausen
imprint: "Francofurti [Frankfurt am Main]: Impensis Joannis Bencardi, bibliopolæ, 1670"
